Description: The candidate could be a Graduate/Undergraduate.Appropriate training would be provided.FRESHERS WELCOME.Skills
Skills: - The candidate could be a Salesperson of any other related field.
- The candidate should be a smart & confident FEMALE with good communication skills.

- Smart freshers and exceptional undergraduates with good potential complying with the above requirements may be considered as Sales Associates. The training period may vary from one to three months depending upon the candidate.
Candidates intending to make a career in Jewellery Sales must apply.
THE CANDIDATE MUST BE LOCATED IN DUBAI
